item.title: Clipboard History in Sway Window Manager
item.description: Recently I switched to the Sway window manager on my favorite laptop and realized that ClipIt does not work there. I was reminded of an old Ruby script I wrote way back in 2012 to serve this purpose. Time to dust that thing off and make it work with Wayland!
